TopicTitle: What were some direct Mercury Hohmann transfer windows/dates?

Articles.Content: I am creating 2 spaceflight-related alternate histories which would include missions directly launched to Mercury. However, there has never been a direct mission to Mercury (all of them have used gravity assists), preventing me from using an existing launch and the synodic period to calculate their launch dates (the only method I know how to use). So, does anyone know any optimal launch dates for direct Mercury transfers?

There is a site called the cosmic train schedule (http://clowder.net/hop/railroad/sched.html). It has Hohmann transfers for a number of bodies including Earth to Mercury.

If you want to work from first principles you might look at http://www.braeunig.us/space/interpl.htm, since alexmoon's launch window planner used it as a guide.
